metadata.title: Portuguese Grammar Placement Test
metadata.description: Comprehensive diagnostic test focusing on Portuguese grammar structures, verb conjugations, and syntax

options: If I were rich, I would travel

options: When I have time, I will travel

questions.pt: O livro que eu li é muito bom
questions.question: What does this mean?
questions.correct: The book that I read is very good
options: The book that I read is very good
The book which I am reading is very good
The good book that I read
I read a very good book
The book I will read is very good
The book is very good to read

questions.pt: A cidade onde nasci é pequena
questions.question: What does this mean?
questions.correct: The city where I was born is small
options: The city where I was born is small
The city that I was born is small
The small city where I was born
I was born in a small city
The city where I live is small
Where I was born the city is small
